control.label: Use TV Alert Feed (Must disable RSS feed)
Enable "Film" view on info Dialogs for Movies
Remove Upcoming Tracks From Music Visualization
Black background while playing music in fullscreen
Enable Clock On Info Screen While Playing Video
Enable Watched Icon for Movie Views
Show Chapter Count On Info Screen While Playing Video
Hide Sketchy Logo on Home Screen
Custom Program Shortcuts on Home Screen
Custom Addon Shortcuts on Home Screen
Custom Menu Shortcuts on Home Screen
Custom Picture Addon Shortcuts on Home Screen
Get Images (Movies)
control.onclick: XBMC.RunScript(script.artwork.downloader, mode=custom, mediatype=movie, characterart, clearlogo, tvthumb, poster, banner, clearart)

control.label: Get Images (TV)
control.onclick: XBMC.RunScript(script.artwork.downloader, mode=custom, mediatype=tvshow, characterart, clearlogo, tvthumb, poster, banner, clearart)

control.label: This feature will add an *EXPERT button to the Video Info Screen for TV Shows. It will give you the ability to create a custom list of shows that will automatically prompt you to delete them after you have watched an episode.
Enable "Delete" Prompt After Watching TV Episodes
